alert.note: Alert for Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 3:23AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant flooding expected along the Big Slough Canal in North Port. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following county, Sarasota. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 323 AM EDT, Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 14 and 18 inches of rain have fallen in the past 24 hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... North Port and Warm Mineral Springs. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
